creator: ProfitTradingApp Co.
descriptionHtml:
** New premium feature! Take advantage from others by getting notified when an order is filled. Available now on Store section inside the app. You don't need to have the app open to receive the notification. **

Increase your profits at Bybit with Profit Trading! Welcome to the the quickest, easiest and best Bybit mobile client. Buy and sell faster at Bybit with a quick and easy to use interface.
Now you can place trailing stop orders at TradingBot section with Extension Pack1!
Bybit
https://profittradingapp.com/

Get more info about how to make profits with the bot

The app is a full Bybit client with the following sections:

- Buy & sell client:
Buy and sell any currency in Bitcoins with a quick and easy to use interface. Designed to make trading easy, you will love it. Buy and sell Bitcoin (BTC) with USDT.

- Orders:
Check your open and closed orders quickly. Cancel your open orders in an easy way.

- Wallet:
A full list of all the currencies in your wallet with their BTC and FIAT equivalences and the total Bitcoin amount. The best place to control your cryptocurrencies.

- TradingBot:
Get profits with conditional orders. Configure the market, the coin and the buying and selling prices and let the bot place the orders for you, so you just have to wait and get your profits. Place an optional stoploss to be able to control disadvantage market conditions.

- TradingBot Extension Pack1:
· TrailingStop
Take advantage of the most powerful order to make profits, TrailingStop! Your sell order will get high as the price grows!

· AutoRestart Bot
Now you can configure trading bots to restart when finished it profit was made.

· Bot filled orders notifications
Receive push notifications when your orders created with the trading bot are filled.

* The number of concurrent bots to be used at the same time is 25.

- SignalBot:
Just write the coin, buy and sell really quickly with the trading bot. Take advantage from others buying when the price is still rising. You will love trading with this app.
Once you placed the order, the app tells you if it was filled or not. It also prints the current price of the coin in Bitcoin, updating it constantly so you can sell it when it reaches the price you want. Sell orders are also placed with the same speed as buy orders, so you can take advantage to others at Bybit.
The bot is fully customizable, you can configure the Bitcoin (BTC) amount to spend and the buy/sell price increment you want to offer from the current coin price. You can also configure if you want to autocancel a non-filled order or not.

New features included in SignalBot:
+ Auto StopLoss
+ Auto TakeProfit
+ Configure the amount of units you want to sell
+ Possibility of canceling orders on SignalBot screen
+ Autocheck for filled orders
+ Percentage of profit trailer included

- Hodl section:
Manage your hodl signals and track your benefits, coin buy price, amount, coin last value, signal date and coin increment. Add signals directly from your bought orders in Orders section or place them manually with the coin selector. Every signal has a direct access to its detailed chart.

- Markets ranking section:
Check the trending markets with most benefits in last 24h. Order them by increment, price or name.

Trading at Bybit has never been so easy! Don't wait more and start increasing your profits with Profit Trading for Bybit!

Become a great trader with the app! Increase your Bitcoins now!

* Residents of the United States of America or Québec (Canada) are prohibited from holding positions or entering into contracts at Bybit. Residents of Cuba, Crimea and Sevastopol, Iran, Syria, North Korea and Sudan, or any other jurisdiction where the services offered by Bybit are restricted are also prohibited.
descriptionShort: Trade faster at Bybit! Bitcoin trading, get profits! Trailing Stop available!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New favorites section
- MInor bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New update with great features!

- Wallet History. Now the app will start tracking your wallet daily so you can easily manage your holdings evolution. Analyzing your profits has never been so easy.
- Alerts. Now you can configure price alerts for any market.
- Multiple account supported: Now you can add up to 4 different Bittrex accounts in ProfitTradingApp.
- New language: Spanish (more languages will be added).
- Favorites section
- New affiliate program
- New Signals Providers Section

Full chart of each coin, with prices and volume history. You can also customize the time range like coinmarketcap. This is a must tool for trading. You can also track BTC realtime chart.

- TradingBot:
Get profits with conditional orders. Configure the market, the coin and the buying and selling prices and let the bot place the orders for you, so you just have to wait and get your profits. Place an optional stoploss to be able to control disadvantage market conditions.

- TradingBot Extension Pack1:
· TrailingStop
Take advantage of the most powerful order to make profits, TrailingStop! Your sell order will get high as the price grows!

· AutoRestart Bot
Now you can configure trading bots to restart when finished it profit was made.

· Bot filled orders notifications
Receive push notifications when your orders created with the trading bot are filled.

* The number of concurrent bots to be used at the same time is 25.

- SignalBot:
Just write the coin, buy and sell really quickly with the trading bot. Take advantage from others buying when the price is still rising. You will love trading with this app.
Once you placed the order, the app tells you if it was filled or not. It also prints the current price of the coin in Bitcoin, updating it constantly so you can sell it when it reaches the price you want. Sell orders are also placed with the same speed as buy orders, so you can take advantage to others at Bybit.
The bot is fully customizable, you can configure the Bitcoin (BTC) amount to spend and the buy/sell price increment you want to offer from the current coin price. You can also configure if you want to autocancel a non-filled order or not.

New features included in SignalBot:
+ Auto StopLoss
+ Auto TakeProfit
+ Configure the amount of units you want to sell
+ Possibility of canceling orders on SignalBot screen
+ Autocheck for filled orders
+ Percentage of profit trailer included

- Hodl section:
Manage your hodl signals and track your benefits, coin buy price, amount, coin last value, signal date and coin increment. Add signals directly from your bought orders in Orders section or place them manually with the coin selector. Every signal has a direct access to its detailed chart.

- Markets ranking section:
Check the trending markets with most benefits in last 24h. Order them by increment, price or name.

Trading at Bybit has never been so easy! Don't wait more and start increasing your profits with Profit Trading for Bybit!

Become a great trader with the app! Increase your Bitcoins now!
descriptionShort: Trade faster at Bybit! Bitcoin trading, get profits! Trailing Stop available!

title: ProfitTradingApp for Bybit

creator: ProfitTradingApp
descriptionHtml:
** Please note that ProfitTradingApp is not the official Bybit app **

Trade faster and easier on Bybit with ProfitTradingApp.

Check your trades and profits easily, and enjoy the full trading experience. Enjoy more features than the official app, trade your favorite cryptos like bitcoin, ethereum, or doge in seconds. Check your profits, find opportunities, and more. Includes:

- Manage multiple accounts easily, switch between accounts in seconds. Great for brokers who manage multiple accounts.
- Lite mode for beginners. Pro mode for experts.
- Position profits manager.
- Use bots to create your strategies, for masters and beginners.

Our 24/7 support team will help you with any questions:

Contact ProfitTradingApp 24/7 support team here

We have been providing services since 2018 with thousands of trades executed. Check it out!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Enjoy lower fees on Bybit trading with ProfitTradingApp.
- App performance improved.
- Enjoy the best Bybit trading interface and trade easier and faster.
